stochastic_function: lambda usage_decision: {0.0: 1.0, 5.0: 0.0, 20.0: 0.0} if usage_decision == "ban" else {0.0: 0.0, 5.0: 1.0, 20.0: 0.0} if usage_decision == "restrict" else {0.0: 0.0, 5.0: 0.0, 20.0: 1.0}

lambda usage_decision, carcinogenic_activity, human_exposure: {0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else ({0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' else ({-0.05: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-0.5: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-5.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'high' else {-1.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-10.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-100.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'high' else {}))

lambda economic_value, cancer_cost: {0.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == 0.0 else {5.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == 5.0 else {4.95: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == 4.95 else {4.5: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == 4.5 else {4.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == 4.0 else {-5.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == -5.0 else {-45.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == -45.0 else {-95.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == -95.0 else {-995.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == -995.0 else {20.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == 20.0 else {19.95: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == 19.95 else {19.5: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == 19.5 else {19.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == 19.0 else {15.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == 15.0 else {10.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == 10.0 else {-30.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == -30.0 else {-80.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == -80.0 else {-980.0: 1.0} if economic_value + cancer_cost == -980.0 else {economic_value + cancer_cost: 1.0}
